title: Thomas Stone National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        THST Open on Monday July 4  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, THST Open on Monday July 4  Thomas Stone NHS will be open on Monday July 4 and will host its annual Independence Day event. The park will be open from 9:00-4:00. Please check this page or our Facebook page as weather could force a change in event activities. Hope to see you then!          Event Moved to Visitor Center  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Event Moved to Visitor Center  Due to today's rainfall, all activities for our Independence Day celebration have been moved into the Visitor Center. The ceremony will begin at 10:00 a.m. followed by the Port Tobacco Players performance at 11:30 a.m. We apologize for the inconvenience.
